name: Racing2D
description:
Racing2D is a simple yet fun racing game in which the only goal is to race yourself against the timer and see what's the best time you can get.

As of now this game is only being developed by 1 man. 

Please donate so i can afford to hire an artist or buy better game assets.

I'd like to thank my friends, who gave me their opinions and suggestions on the game, and give special thanks to the Godot discord server people who helped me while developing the game.

Please do give a review/your opinion on the game in the comment section.
